…

…”

In the past year, your Dragon Nest has been repaired seven times, and the construction and maintenance cost totaled 13,000 gold coins;

Compensation for medical expenses for the wounded and comfort for the dead, totaling 23,000 gold coins;

Because of your cruelty, a large number of female beasts died, including two female monsters. You need to pay a total of 34,000 gold coins as compensation.

…

Mr. Maxim, if you have no doubts about these accounts, please sign here! "

…”

…

In addition, as long as you don't cause trouble or fight, your expenses will be greatly reduced. "

Even if he got the pill, everyone would only think that Hudson used a special method to extract energy from the magic crystal.

Being able to spend the money of the dragon and the bear to raise the Warcraft Legion for himself, Hudson has no pressure at all.
